text: Yiniharule (kapatacariharule mominaharusita) kara'era bhannechan ki ke hami timro sathama thi'enaum, uniharule bhannechan kina thi'enau, tara timile svayam aphule nai aphula'i vicalanama paryau ra pratiksa garirakhyau ra sandehama parirahyau ra timra vyarthaka kamanaharule timila'i dhokama rakhe, yahamsam'ma ki allahako phaisala a'ihalyo ra timila'i allahako barema dhoka dinele dhokamai rakhirakhyo
